name: event-management-system
description: Hub for all programs in the EMS suite.

scripts.ems: concurrently --kill-others "cd ems-core/ && npm run desktop" "cd ems-core/ && npm run react"
scripts.build-audience: cd audience-display/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-ref: cd ref-tablet/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-pit: cd pit-display/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-fms: cd ems-frc-fms/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-core: cd ems-core/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-home: cd ems-home/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-api: cd ems-api/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-sck: cd ems-socket/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-web: cd ems-web/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-webapps: npm run build-audience && npm run build-ref && npm run build-core && npm run build-home
scripts.build-services: npm run build-api && npm run build-sck && npm run build-web
scripts.build: npm run build-services && npm run build-webapps
